Address: Lot 16 Portview Avenue/Buttonwood Way Grantville VIC 3984
Description:
Final Stage of Eastern Shores
Lot 16 Corner of Portview Avenue/Buttonwood Way, 591m2
Eastern Shores Estate last and FINAL land release is underway with Titles expected early 2018. The land enjoys views towards the sea and the woodland nature reserve next to the estate. Land sizes vary and the land whilst mostly flat has some elevated lots which will capture views. This is the final stage of land release in Grantville at present so get in early to secure your lot. Eastern Shores is located minutes stroll away from all the shops and services in Grantville which include a Post Office, Newsagency, Council Offices, Medical Centre, Ambulance station and Chemist. There are a number of Cafes and fast food outlets and a Bakery. Grantville is approx. 20 mins from San Remo, 30 mins from Wonthaggi and Cowes and approx. 35 mins from Cranbourne and Pakenham. There is an excellent new Early Childhood campus beside the popular Bass Valley Primary School and there are multiple Secondary School options in the locality. A V- Line Bus runs regularly to Melbourne and beyond into Gippsland. The township is growing rapidly but land is running out just as fast!
Deposit of $500 is due upon signing contracts with the balance of 10% deposit within 21 days. The balance will be due within 14 days of the Titles being issued by the Land Titles office.
Contact Liz Leahy for more information on 0487 022 099

Description:
Langley Park Estate - Lang Lang Stage 1
Exciting New Land Release in Lang Lang. Fully serviced blocks. Ranging in size from 602m2 - 884m2.
With the district growing at a rapid rate and talk of trains returning and an airport being built, you will never get a better time to secure your own piece of land in this growth corridor. Long settlements available to approved clients. Register your interest by calling or emailing our office. 03 5997 2133 or kooweerup@cho1ce.com.au.
Due to be released around mid year 2017 Larger blocks ranging from 878m2 - 2561m2.

Description:
2 Bedroom Home With Dual Access
This home has a nice feel with lots to offer on a 755m2 laneway access to a double gated front verandah with shade blinds. Open plan living, spacious master bedroom, semi ensuite double shower vanity was updated last year. Plenty of room in the kitchen, lots of cupboards, pantry, and gas cooker. Large sized sunroom on back of house. New gas heater, reverse cycle air con, good sized laundry, linen cupboard, separate toilet, carport, water tanks and a tool shed.

Description:
Four Bedroom Modern Home with Bay Views
Wonderful opportunity to acquire this beautifully presented modern family home offering so many sort after features.
There are 4 double bedrooms, master with full ensuite and WIR. The kitchen has been well designed with under bench oven, twin draw dishwasher, stone bench tops and a large walk-in pantry. Also featuring lovely living area's with large lounge, family and meals area's, a large tiled bathroom, enormous laundry with walk-in linen press, tiled entrance and an excellent decked alfresco area offering lovely bay views. Other extra's include ducted heating & cooling, split system air conditioning, 4kw solar & solar hot water. Double garage with internal access & automatic door plus wide access gates perfect for caravan, trailer or boat. Be quick to phone on this delightful stylish residence.
Insights: 4 other 4 bedroom house in Grantville have recently been sold.

Description:
WELL LOCATED VERSATILE LIFESTYLE FAMLIY HOME
Beautifully looked after this quality home offers flexible living areas to suit all family members.
Boasting three generous bedrooms, with self-contained apartment attached to the home with the option to make a master bedroom with parents retreat, or you could quite easily turn in to a fourth bedroom.
Living, dining and kitchen zones are open plan and positioned for easy access onto large timber sun deck with palms & ferns that overlook a lovely park, ideal for those summer BBQ's and entertaining.
Newly installed split system heating & cooling, wood heater to take care of those cold winter months.
Double garage, low maintenance fully fenced yard simply completes this fabulous package....
Only minutes to local shops and cafes, wineries and Phillip Island is approximately 25 minutes away.
Agent available 7 days a week.

Address: B/4 WHITSTABLE STREET Lang Lang VIC 3984
Description:
UNDER OFFER IN 2 DAYS! HISTORIC TOWNHOUSE IN CENTRAL LOCATION
Ozzing with charm and character and across the road from the local kindergarten and doctors and a very short walk to the supermarket, chemist etc in Lang Lang, only 20 minutes to Pakenham and 25 minutes to Cranbourne making this an ideal and affordable first home or downsizer. The home has an attractive entry, baltic pine floors, high ceilings, two generous bedrooms with open fire places, cozy living room with open fire place and split system heating/cooling. The quaint kitchen where you would expect the aroma of fresh baked bread to whaft through the home has a wood stove and electric oven. The bathroom and laundry are at the rear of the home and lead to the outside entertaining area, garden shed and a surprising large rear yard big enough to house a double garage with room to spare. There are fruit trees and a well fenced yard for children or pets. A great little find in your hunt for a home.
Insights: 4 other 2 bedroom house in Lang Lang have recently been sold.

Description:
Outstanding Building Block with Bay Views
This beautiful 810 m2 (approx) block is situated in the very quiet coastal township of Corinella, positioned just metres to the water. Surrounded by quality homes this is a unique opportunity to build your dream home for either permanent living or holidays or any easy subdivision (STCA). Come and visit and whilst your here check out the excellent fishing, boating & recreational facilities (24 hour jetty) that Corinella is famous for. Be quick to call on this beauty!

Description:
SPACIOUS HOME NEAR BAY !!
Just move in and enjoy this very neat and beautifully presented home, providing all the comforts a family needs. In a desired location, this brick home set on approx.. 600 sq.m. of land comprises -
- 4 bedrooms with built in robes - master with walk in robe and en suite.
- 2 living zones.
- Open plan kitchen with stainless steel wall oven and dishwasher, and meal area.
- Sliding door from meals that leads to a large undercover entertaining area.
- 2 split-system air conditioners.
- Tiled floors throughout for easy cleaning, except in bedrooms that are carpeted.
- Family bathroom with full bath and separate shower.
- Double lock-up garage with drive through door, leading to backyard for easy access for trailer etc.
- Concreted driveway.
- Low maintenance backyard.
- Fenced out back for dogs, children and privacy.
- Appealing front with low maintenance garden.
Walk to coastal pathway , shop, tennis courts, community centre, hall and bus stops. There is a 24 hour boat ramp/jetty only 2 minutes away and small group of local shops with bank, chemist, newsagency, cafes, primary school, kindergarten and wineries all approximately 7 minutes. Major shopping centre and Phillip Island approximately 25 minutes and easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.
If you are seeking a more tranquil lifestyle near the water and need that spacious family home an inspection is a must!!!!
We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Address: Lot 1 Long Point Road French Island VIC 3921
Description:
ZONED COMMERCIAL! DEVELOP YOUR RESORT HERE
One of only 3 areas zoned for Tourist Development on the island.
50 acres with unsurpassed sea views, direct access to extensive private beach, in fact the property comprises the whole of a very prominent headland on the south east corner of the island directly overlooking Elizabeth Island and beyond to San Remo, Phillip Island and the Bass Hills.
Well fenced for sheep or cattle with few native trees and two dams.
An unsurpassed blank canvas awaiting the strokes of a developers brush.
Contact Exclusive Agent Phil Bock on 0438 497 715 for inspection and Vendors Statement.

Description:
WATER VIEWS - QUIET ESTATE!!!!
Enjoying views of Westernport Bay, this delightful 2 storey home features: upstairs spacious sunroom, open plan living/kitchen and meals area with floating floor, wood heater and door leading onto good size balcony capturing bay views and beautiful sunsets, 2 bedrooms and family bathroom.
Downstairs features: a kitchenette, bedroom/living area and powder room.
Situated on an undulating block with established fruit trees, carport, fully fenced and has plenty of room in front yard for caravan/boat. Close to small group of shops with cafes, doctor, chemist and bank, wineries, tourism attractions, v-line and school bus services and only 30kms to Wonthaggi.

Description:
Dream Corner Block Overlooking Westernport
Fabulous 640m2, this corner block in Grantville Rise estate offers potential to capture Westernport water views. The estate is nearing to a close and this is one of the best elevated yet level blocks on the market. Just an easy stroll to all the amenities Grantville Village shops have to offer and so close to the Bay, the Pier and walking tracks. 20 mins by road to Phillip Island or a short 40 min commute to Cranbourne.
All you need to do is appoint a builder and get things underway!

Description:
LARGE COASTAL BLOCK !
Ideally located in an exclusive estate in the popular fishing village of Corinella is this good size parcel of land approx.. 861 sq.m. which may offer glimpses of the bay from a two-storey dwelling. Corinella offers scenic coastal walks, recreation facilities such as tennis court and lawn bowls, playground, community centre, hall, general store and 24 hour boat ramp and jetty. There is a water tap to property and fence along front.
Phillip Island and major shopping centre approx.. 25 mins and local primary school and kindergarten approx.. 7 mins.
This land can also be viewed on www.yourlandshop.com.au

Description:
ATTRACTIVE HOME WITH STUNNING VIEWS
You won't be disappointed inspecting this well maintained home with it's high ceilings, spacious rooms and magnificent bay views. It's perfect to make your home with easy access to the highway, walking distance to the shops yet in a peaceful location. There is an expansive deck at the side and rear of the home plus a cozy front deck, perfect for that morning coffee gazing over the bay. The home has three big bedrooms, a large open plan living area with a huge reverse cycle split system air conditioner. There is a near new kitchen with a big pantry, dish washer and 900ml stainless steel oven. The bathroom is spacious with a corner bath and separate shower. On the rear deck is access to another toilet, perfect for entertaining and at the rear of the property you will find a man cave/shed. A very neat package that you would be proud to call home.

Description:
DOUBLE STORY HOME BY THE BAY!
We have found the perfect home for those looking for a sea change or simply want a weekend getaway with majestic views; you just canâ??t get better than this! From the moment, you arrive in the drive way you will be welcomed by a unique and enticing facade positioned in a prime location, approximately 200 metres to the boat ramp, walking distance to the local shop, tennis courts, lawn bowls, community centre and the V-Line bus service stops close by.
The open living with polished floors is a delightful sanctum to enjoy spending family time in the light and bright lounge room that is overlooked by the kitchen that comes fully equipped with a gas burner cooktop and plenty of cupboard space. Nearby is the meals area where a delicious home cooked meal can be appreciated whilst being captivated by the spectacular and surreal ocean views.
Sleeping arrangements will not be an issue with the three bedrooms that are on offer; two of which a situated upstairs; the master bedroom with floor to ceiling windows capturing the stunning coast line as well as allowing natural light to beam through and brighten the room. Further luxuries that can be enjoyed are; air conditioning, sliding doors leading you to one of the balconies, an extra-large two car garage, perfect for your boat and also the extra roller door to the rear giving access to the private large back yard space that is sitting on 910 metres approximately.
This one wonâ??t last long, contact Zed now to avoid disappointment!

Description:
MODERN EXCELLENCE
A modern classic with stunning Western Port Bay views. Boasting a premier position on Moorings Place. This stunning residence offers luxury living in a desirable location.
Ideal for indoor/outdoor living, with generous entertaining area on the front deck and at the rear of the property as well, the private garden shows off the many aspects of this fabulous property.
The open-plan layout provides space and comfort with two living areas, including a family room down stairs that opens out to the entertaining area and garden. Three bedroom's all with BIRs, share a large central bathroom, separate toilet, and large laundry down stairs.
The large master suite upstairs has a walk-in-robe and ensuite, and study nook.
Set as the heart of the home, the kitchen is seductively subtle upon first glance and offers exceptional quality and detail throughout. With beautiful wrap around window, modern appliances, breakfast bar the entire space is both functional and aesthetically pleasing.
Leading out to the open plan dining and lounge area, the atmosphere in the room is indescribable. With high ceilings, reverse cycle heating and cooling upstairs and down, wood fire, you will living in 5 star decadence.
The home also offers- Remote garage x 2 cars, 2 garden sheds, Solar panels, fully fenced property.
This property offers a tranquil escape and an enviable lifestyle moments from the spectacular walking tracks. Close to the General Store, Park, Schools, Boat Ramp and more, it is a place you will be proud to call home.
Please call Tamara Or Daniel to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
COASTAL LIVING WITH INSPIRING BAY VIEWS
Situated in a quiet cul-de-sac this attractive two storey home has personality, character and charm and you'll feel instantly at home.
Featuring -
Downstairs -
- Bright casual kitchen, dining and lounge area
- Sliding door to balcony with magic bay views
- Split-system airconditioner
- Ceiling fans and wwc
- Bathroom
- nook/computer room
- powder room
Upstairs -
- 3 generous sized bedrooms with BIRs master with walk-in-robe and
- French doors to balcony offering beautiful sea breezes
- 2nd living area with French doors to balcony
- Bay views all along from top floor
- Bathroom
This property is situated on an undulating block approx.. 699 sq.m. with many bonuses, glasshouse, 3 water tanks, garden shed, established backyard with pond, solar hws, 8 solar panels, large garage and workshop with concrete floor, power, sink, and there is a home office/laundry with separate entrance from home. Close to wineries, local shops and easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway. Phillip Island and major shopping centre approx.. 25 mins.
Inspection a must.

Description:
115 Acre Race Horse/Cattle Farm - Sheds Galore
4 Bedroom Australiana Country Style Homestead set on 115 acres of prime agricultural land situated moments from the Bass Highway. This property has plenty of day yards for horses, loose boxes and round yard. Stock yards with easy sorting yards, a huge dam and 3 enormous tradesman's sheds with concrete floors and a 60m x 20 metre unfinished Olympic size horse menage plus a lot more. Be quick on calling as this is a quality acreage property.
